desc: Dog clothing that is fun, inspired and practical. The dog bathrobe dries your pup, the mitt dries the paws, the bandanas and coats in fun, bright colors highlight your dog's personality. Made in the USA, reversible dog bandanas and coats speak for your dog. We've got your dog covered.

layout.text: “I can’t believe it took us so long to get one! It’s perfect for him because he’s obsessed with swimming and napping on the couch” @Bentleyfromtheburbs
